name: MarketingAssistantbyDatorama
0:
”Alexa, Ask Marketing Assistant to pair this device”
”Alexa, Ask Marketing Assistant for my marketing daily brief”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: marketing assistant
des:
The Marketing Assistant skill is the complementary Alexa product to the Datorama Marketplace Marketing Assistant application. 

The Marketing Assistant skill and app are the perfect tools for quickly and efficiently generating high-level views of your marketing data. The Marketing Assistant App and skill is the best way to give an executive user flexibility in querying selected marketing data from a Datorama instance using intuitive interfacing like voice or text, rather than ask a Datorama expert for a change or addition to a dashboard. It can also be used to track KPIs and the status of goals, as well as quickly build executive views in Data Canvas (Datorama’s data visualization toolkit).
